data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Hanzhong do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hanzhong, Shaanxi, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 27 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, China.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, make the 28,008 believers in Hanzhong to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 341,192 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Hanzhong.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Guaigun people might believe through him.
Jesus, please give your people in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, China a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, China with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
